fields.name: baseSettings.queryLimit

fields.label: Grab Limit

fields.label: Apps Minimum Seeders

fields.name: torrentBaseSettings.packSeedTime

fields.label: Prefer Magnet URL

fields.helpText: Search freeleech torrents only
fields.label: Freeleech Only
fields.name: freeleechOnly

fields.helpText: Exclude RAW torrents from results
fields.label: Exclude RAW
fields.name: excludeRaw

fields.helpText: Exclude Hentai torrents from results
fields.label: Exclude Hentai
fields.name: excludeHentai

fields.helpText: Makes Prowlarr to search by year as a different argument in the request.
fields.label: Search By Year
fields.name: searchByYear

fields.helpText: Makes Prowlarr try to add Season information into Release names, without this Sonarr can't match any Seasons, but it has a lot of false positives as well
fields.label: Enable Sonarr Compatibility
fields.name: enableSonarrCompatibility

fields.helpText: Add a release using the actual filename, this currently only works for single episode releases
fields.label: Use Filenames for Single Episodes
fields.name: useFilenameForSingleEpisodes

fields.helpText: Makes Prowlarr add Japanese titles as synonyms, i.e kanji/hiragana/katakana.
fields.label: Add Japanese title as a synonym
fields.name: addJapaneseTitle

fields.helpText: Makes Prowlarr add Romaji title as a synonym, i.e "Shingeki no Kyojin" with Attack on Titan
fields.label: Add Romaji title as a synonym
fields.name: addRomajiTitle

fields.helpText: Makes Prowlarr add alternative title as a synonym, i.e "AoT" with Attack on Titan, but also "Attack on Titan Season 4" Instead of "Attack on Titan: The Final Season"
fields.label: Add alternative title as a synonym
fields.name: addAlternativeTitle
